TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageTheme extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the base class for a page theme, which is a collection of resources that are used to define a consistent look across pages and controls in a Web site. The page theme can be set through configuration or the page directive.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Page and control developers do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkinDelegate>, <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlSkin>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> classes directly. These classes are used by the ASP.NET parser and runtime to apply style sheet elements that are defined in ASP.NET themes and control skins files to pages and specific types of controls.
Page developers enable (or disable) page themes using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Theme%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> properties. For more information about page themes, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract string AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory { get; }
.property instance string AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory
Protected MustOverride ReadOnly Property AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory As String
protected: abstract property System::String ^ AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory : string

Docs.summary: When overridden a derived class, gets the relative URL of the directory for the object.
Docs.value: A string value containing the relative URL of the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property is abstract. When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property. The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property to resolves a relative URL to an absolute URL.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets an interface of the names of all default skins that are available for the current page theme, indexed by control type.
Docs.value: An that represents the control skins associated with the current page theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.ControlSkins%2A> property is abstract. When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.

Docs.returns: An object that can be used as a lookup key in a dictionary-style collection, which contains the control type and skin ID information.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of style sheets that are linked to this page.
Docs.value: A string array of style sheets linked to this page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme.LinkedStyleSheets%2A> property is abstract and must be implemented in a derived class. When compiled, a theme will generate code that overrides this property.

Docs.summary: Provides support for parsing and evaluating an XPath data-binding expression in theme skin files.
